title.rendered: Recognised as ‘Most Trusted NGO in Child Development’

content.rendered: Smile Foundation was honored with the ‘Most Trusted NGO in Child Development’ Award by Brand Empower at the National Quality Awards 2024. The award, presented by Padma Shri Awardee Ms. Raveena Tandon, recognizes the foundation’s commitment to transforming the lives of underserved children across India through its flagship education programme. We dedicate this recognition to our team members who work tirelessly across the country, often in the most challenging environments, to spread smiles and create opportunities for children and their families.
